SEARCH
Package org.rancore.math

Class ComplexNumber

java.lang.Object
org.rancore.math.ComplexNumber
public class ComplexNumber extends Object
Represents a complex number. A complex number consists of a real part and an imaginary part.

    • ComplexNumber

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

      The entry point of the ComplexNumber program.

      This method can run in two modes:

      1. Demo mode: Demonstrates operations on complex numbers using hardcoded values.
      2. Interactive mode: Allows users to perform operations on complex numbers specified via command-line arguments.

      Usage:

      • For demo mode: java ComplexNumber or java ComplexNumber -demo
      • For interactive mode: java ComplexNumber <real1> <imag1> <real2> <imag2>

      In interactive mode, the program accepts four command-line arguments representing two complex numbers: <real1> <imag1> for the first complex number and <real2> <imag2> for the second.

      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments. If empty or "-demo", runs in demo mode. If 4 arguments are provided, they should be numbers representing two complex numbers.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - If the provided arguments in interactive mode cannot be parsed as doubles.

    • magnitude

      public double magnitude()
      Calculates the magnitude (absolute value) of this complex number. The magnitude is defined as the square root of (real² + imaginary²).
      Returns:
      The magnitude of the complex number as a double.

    • conjugate

      public ComplexNumber conjugate()
      Generates the complex conjugate of this number. The complex conjugate has the same real part but a negated imaginary part.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexNumber representing the complex conjugate.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the complex number. The representation is in the form "a + bi" or "a - bi".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the complex number.
